free: #e I am going to tell you, children, a story about our ancestors.
#c 我要跟你們這些小孩說我們祖先的故事。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Long time ago, our Kavalan ancestors came from Yi-lan.
#c 從前我們噶瑪蘭的祖先從宜蘭來。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e They (came from) the county Yi-lan.
#c 他們從宜蘭縣過來。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e ‘In Yi-lan ancestors cultivated fields of rice and planted rice.
#c 在宜蘭祖先開墾水田, 耕種水田。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Men went fishing and hunting for food for all children and elders.
#c 男人去捕魚打獵好讓老人小孩都有東西吃。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e And this is Kavalans’ way of life in Yi-lan.
#c 這就是噶瑪蘭人在宜蘭的生活方式。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e And in the past, there were no roads in Hualien, and now they say Su-hua Road, the name of that road.
#c 從前花蓮都沒有路, 現在他們說蘇花公路, 就是那條路的名字。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Our Kavalan ancestors broadened the road to Hualien.
#c 噶瑪蘭的祖先開拓通往花蓮的道路。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e So they considered Kavalan ancestors brave.
#c 人們覺得噶瑪蘭的祖先很勇敢。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Perhaps, (the road) was going to be finished, and then there was a road to Hualien.
#c 可能快要完工了, 然後就有了到花蓮的路。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e In the past, our ancestors’ village was in Yilan.
#c 從前我們祖先的村莊是在宜蘭。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e My ancestors moved towards Hualien, and then changed to Xin-she.
#c 我的祖先搬往花蓮,然後又換到新社。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Perhaps our ancestors all develped fields of rice in Xinshe.
#c 也許我們的祖先們都在新社開墾水田。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e In the past, our ancestors cultivated fields of rice in Xinshe.
#c 從前我們的祖先在新社耕種水田。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e In the past, (our) ancestors went fishing and hunting.
#c 從前祖先們去捕魚打獵。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Our ancestors were very competent in the past.
#c 我們從前的祖先是非常能幹的。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Perhaps (it was how) they nurtured (their) children in Xinshe.
#c 也許他們在新社就是這樣養小孩的。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e There existed in Xinshe some superstitions of (our) ancestors.
#c 在新社我們的祖先有一些迷信。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e They said it’s been half a year.
#c 他們說已經半年了。
#n dalusa=ti zanum  水的一半‘half of the water’

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Our ancestors said ‘We are going to the seashore.’ And they went fishing.
#c 祖先說「我們要去海邊」, 然後就捕魚去了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e They said ‘we saw the tree, the red flowers of Napas tree. They’ve blossomed.’
#c 他們說「我們看到樹, Napas樹的紅葉,已經開花了」。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e The elders took raft and boat.
#c 老人們搭竹筏和船。
#n baqi-an: 老人 old man
#n baq-baqi-an: 老人們 old men
#n sunis: 小孩  child
#n sun-sunis zau: 這些小孩 these children
#n si-su-sunis: 帶小孩們 take children
#n mazmun sunis: 很多小孩 many children
#n mawza sudad: 很多書 many books

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e In that way, they caught fish and had all the children move (rafts and boats).
#c 那樣(赤桐花開花後),他們去捕魚,叫所有的小孩搬(竹筏&船)。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e In addition, female elders were going to make wine from glutinous rice.
#c 另外,女生老人要釀糯米酒了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e ‘Now, it is going to be the second year’, said the female elders.
#c 現在要邁入第二年了, 老人這麼說。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e (We) were to make wine from glutinous rice, (so we) steamed glutinous rice.
#c (我們)要釀糯米酒了,(所以)蒸糯米。
#n isi: 糯米酒 wine made from polished glutinous rice
#n snapwaR: 糯米 polished glutinous rice

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e New year was coming soon and we were to have New Year, said they.
#c 過年了,我們快過年了, 他們說。
#n qaseq-an-ku: 我到的地方 the place where I went to
#n maseq=ti=isu: 你到了嗎? Have you arrived?
#n qaseq-an-ku lepaw-na: 我到他家 I went to his house
#n maseq=ti=iku ta-lepaw-an-na: 我到他家了 I have arrived at his house
#n qaseq=ti=iku ta-lepaw-an-na: 我會到他家 I will go to his house
#n qa-ngid=ti=ita qan satutu: 快吃中餐了 We are about to have lunch

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e The female elder really opened (the can of) the wine made from glutinous rice.
#c 老人們真的打開了糯米酒(的罐子)。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e ‘We are going to worship our ancestors,’ they said.
#c 我們要祭祖,他們說。
#n m-lilin=palilin

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Female elders worshipped ancestors at that time.
#c 女老人家當時就祭祖,那樣。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e These things were what female elder had to do before New Year.
#c 那樣的事情是我們婦女過年前做的事情。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e There were children. …We had free time, said male elders and children.
#c 有小孩…我們都有空閒, 老人和小孩說。
#n mai tu lalas: 沒事(i.e. 有空) available
#n mai tu lawal: 沒空 busy; no time to do (sth else)

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e ’We will go to the sea,’ said the older children.
#c 我們要去海邊,比較大的小孩說。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Going together, not alone and not in two.
#c 一起去,不是單獨一個人,也不是兩個人。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Going to the sea together in three, four or five.
#c 三個,四個,五個人一起去海邊。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Men went to the sea to shoot fish, catch holiotis.diversicolor.supertexta and lobsters.
#c 男人到海邊射魚,抓九孔和龍蝦。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e It’s noon and they were not stingy with what they’ve got.
#c 中午了,他們對於他們所收穫得並不吝嗇。
#n m-lawung aiku: 我很小氣 I’m stingy.
#n * lawung-an-ku
#n * qa-lawung-an-ku
#n kuay: 耕田; 收穫 till/cultivate the land, harvest

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e They grilled their fish.
#c 他們烤魚。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Lobsters, they boiled; holiotis.diversicolor.supertexta, they boiled.
#c 龍蝦,用煮的,九孔,用煮的。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e The men going together were not stingy to each other with all the things.
#c 一起去的男人不對彼此吝嗇所有的東西。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e (They) went to the sea without bring any meals.
#c (他們)去海邊不帶菜。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e only rice, pepper, and salt.
#c 只有飯,辣椒和鹽。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We females went to pick food at the seaside, my mother said in the past.
#c 我們女生去撿海菜/貝類,我媽媽從前說。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

gloss: 撿海邊的食物=未來=1IPL.主格

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Prepare rice, salt and pepper.
#c 就準備飯鹽和辣椒。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e These are the things we took to go (there).
#c 這是我們帶去的東西。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e I (went) with my mother.
#c 我跟媽媽一起(去)。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We picked up shells.
#c 我們撿海貝。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We picked up conches.
#c 我們撿海螺。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We picked up shells.
#c 我們撿海貝。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We picked up sea cucumbers.
#c 我們撿海參。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We picked up laver and other seaweed.
#c 我們撿紫菜和海菜類。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e What we picked up are many in number.
#c 我們撿的東西很多。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e That’s how we females are like.
#c 我們女生就那樣。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e what we would bring home
#c 我們要帶回家的東西。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e ‘You returned,’ said grandmother at home.
#c 阿媽說,你們回來了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We’ve come back.
#c 我們回來了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e Is what you got many in number?
#c 你們撿的東西多嗎?

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We said, ‘a lot, Grandma.’
#c 我們說,阿媽,很多。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)

free: #e (When) Grandmother were still at home,
#c 阿媽還在家的時候。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe(新社)
meta.speaker: 林阿份, Ngengi, female, 1941-07-04

free: #e We Kavalan. I am going to talk about …
#c 我們噶瑪蘭, 我要講說…
